description: Aspose.Tasks for .NET is a .NET Project management component that enables .NET applications to not only read and manipulate Microsoft Project documents in MPP and XML formats but to also write Microsoft Project documents in MPP or Project XML format - all without using Microsoft Project.
releaseNotes:
Bugs
TASKS-33176 - Resource Assignment work is 0 after rewriting.
TASKS-33193 - Issue in reading data in custom fields
TASKS-33196 - Wrong Order of Tasks after adding Extended Attribute and calling CalcTaskIds
TASKS-33206 - CalculateCriticalPath() hangs the application for some time


Enhancments
TASKS-20454 - Provision of In-Memory project data recalculations

New Features
TASKS-33197 - Write updated Task data back to MPP file
TASKS-33198 - Write updated TaskLink data back to MPP file
TASKS-33199 - Write updated Resource data back to MPP file
TASKS-33201 - Write updated extended attributes definitions and values back to MPP file
TASKS-33202 - Write updated outline codes definitions and values back to MPP files
TASKS-33203 - Write updated calendar data to MPP file
summary: Aspose.Tasks for .NET is a component to work with Project files
title: Aspose.Tasks for .NET
